description: This file implements a Signup page component for a Next.js application, handling user registration with validation, interaction with Supabase for authentication, optional organization creation, and redirection upon success.

methods.name: SignupPage
methods.description: Main React functional component for user signup, manages form state, validation, submission, and user navigation.

methods.name: validate
methods.description: Validates the signup form fields and sets error messages accordingly.

methods.name: handleSignup
methods.description: Handles the form submission, performs validation, calls Supabase signUp, creates organization if provided, and manages navigation upon success.
